My Daily Routine

Morning

Each morning, I checked Slack to review updates from my supervisor or responses to any questions I had asked the previous day. Make sure to always check your messages in the morning even if you have an afternoon placement as around this time, your supervisors are first logging onto their job.

Afternoon

In the afternoon, during my placement hours, I worked in the school library or at home if the library was closed. This was when I focused on developing features for the app.

After School

After school, I dedicated time to fixing bugs or developing additional features for the app if I had free time.
